thread.title: Ward’s hat trick helps Sharks end 3-game skid
thread.title_full: Ward’s hat trick helps Sharks end 3-game skid - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ross McKeon
title: Ward’s hat trick helps Sharks end 3-game skid
text:
Photo: George Nikitin, Associated Press Joel Ward, right, celebrates with teammate Brent Burns after completing his hat trick in the final minute of play. Joel Ward, right, celebrates with teammate Brent Burns after...
Joel Ward is hoping to earn the respect of his teammates after signing as a free agent in the offseason. Judging by how he was showered with a dozen or so hats during a media scrum following his second career hat trick Saturday night, he’s well on his way. Joel Ward, right, celebrates with teammate Brent Burns after completing his hat trick in the final minute of play. Joel Ward, right, celebrates with teammate Brent Burns after...
Joel Ward is hoping to earn the respect of his teammates after signing as a free agent in the offseason. Judging by how he was showered with a dozen or so hats during a media scrum following his second career hat trick Saturday night, he’s well on his way.
